com.netflix.genie.client

Class HiveConfigServiceClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.client.BaseGenieClient
      • com.netflix.genie.client.HiveConfigServiceClient

  • public final class HiveConfigServiceClient
extends BaseGenieClient
    Singleton class, which acts as the client library for the Hive Config Service.
